resources.string: Go back to the previous screen
Create a new password of six characters or more
The passcode you entered is invalid. Please try again
The fingerprint option is off. Tap to turn on
The fingerprint option is on. Tap to turn off
You\'ve reached the maximum number of attempts with your current verification code. To continue, we\'ll send another code to %1$s to verify your identity.
You should receive an email with the code shortly. Didn\'t receive our email? To get a new code, use Resend.
A code will be sent to your email address %1$s. Please use the code to verify your account.
The remember me option is off. Tap to turn on
The remember me option is on. Tap to turn off
To keep your account safe, we’re going to send you a verification code to %1$s. Please use the code to verify your identity.
This app does not have permissions to access your address book
This app does not have permissions to access your device location
Address Carousel, swipe left or right to select different address. Go to extreme right to add a new address
Card Carousel, swipe left or right to select different card. Go to extreme right to add a new card
We couldn\'t verify the address you entered with the postal service. Would you like to save it anyway?
This is my preferred shipping address
This is your preferred shipping address
Your session is about to expire, please tap screen to continue with Visa Checkout
One or more entries contains an error
No, continue my purchase using Visa Checkout
Yes, close and cancel my purchase using Visa Checkout
Would you like to end Visa Checkout?
You are on a secure page
For your protection and to prevent unauthorised access, we\'ve locked your account. Please contact customer support.
Are you sure you want to delete this shipping address?
Are you sure you want to stop creating your account?
Are you sure you want to close Visa Checkout?
To prevent unauthorised access, we have locked your account for one hour. Please try again later
We apologise for any inconvenience, but you have exceeded the maximum amount of attempts allowed. You can try again after one hour
There seems to be a problem with deleting this address. Do you want to retry?
Visa Checkout will display your credit or debit card design providing you with a more personalised shopping experience
Your username will be remembered on this device. Enter only your password when signing in
Personalise your experience with Visa Checkout!
Sorry, we are unable to process your request at this time. Try again later, or create a new account
Sorry, we are unable to process your request at this time. Try again later, or create a new account
Sorry, we are unable to process your request at this time. We apologise for the inconvenience
An internal error caused the payment to be aborted
Please choose another password that meets the minimum requirements
There seems to be a problem with the network. Please try again
Oops, looks like you have no cards on file. Please add a credit or debit card to continue with this purchase.
Your Visa Checkout account is unavailable at this time. Please contact Customer Support
3 or more identical consecutive characters not allowed.
Password cannot contain spaces or a portion of your username
Password must contain at least 6 characters
Password must not contain more than 32 characters
Your payment cannot be processed. Please correct your card information and try again
For security reasons, your session has timed out due to inactivity

Sorry, the answer you provided does not match the one in our records. For your protection and to prevent unauthorised access, we\'ve temporarily locked your account. Try again later, or create a new account
Sorry, for your protection, we\'ve locked your account. Click on "Forgot Password" if you have forgotten your password, or create a new account if you have forgotten your username
Sorry, we are unable to locate your account. Please check your username or password
We apologise for any inconvenience, but we’re experiencing some technical difficulties. Please try again later
Sorry, but we are unable to process your request at this time. Please try again later
There is already a username associated with this email address. If you\'ve forgotten your password, please use "Forgot Password" to reset it.
According to our records, this email address or mobile number is already enrolled in a Visa Checkout account
Please be aware that if these Cookies are disabled, not all features of the Visa Checkout Site may operate as intended, as described in the policy above.
Accept Preference, Analytics, and Advertising Cookies
Your Visa Checkout account was created!
I consent to my information being used to check against international sanctions.
Use mobile number as username instead. Link
Next: Review and confirm your payment details
Make signing in easy on this device

I hereby acknowledge and confirm that I have read, understand and agree to be bound by the Visa Checkout Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. I also accept Visa Checkout\'s Electronic Communication Policy, and agree to receive notices via email instead of by mail.
Invalid Password. New password must be different from the old password
This merchant does not accept Electron (debit). Please change to Credit to use this card.
This merchant does not accept Credit. Please change to Visa Electron (debit) to use this card.
The information you entered is not supported. Please contact Customer Support.
Send verification code to your email address
Enter a new password below. Once you\'ve successfully created your password, you\'ll continue with this purchase.
Sorry, we\'re unable to complete this step. We\'ve temporarily locked your account for security reasons. Please try again later or contact Customer Support.
You\'ve reached the maximum number of attempts with your current verification code. To continue, we\'ll send you another code to verify your identity.
A code will be sent to your email address. Please use the code to verify your account.
To keep your account safe, we’re going to send you a verification code in an email. Please use the code to verify your identity.
Forgot Your Password? Enter your email address to get the instructions
We could not find that email address in our system. Please try entering another email address, or you can create a new Visa Checkout account.
Enter the email address associated with your Visa Checkout account and we\'ll send you a code to reset your password
Forgot Password. Reset code was sent to your email
Another code was sent to %1$s. If you haven\'t received it yet, give it a few more minutes. Please follow the email instructions
We\'ll send another password reset code to %1$s
Wait for a few more minutes--your internet connection speed or email provider may need more time
Forgot your Visa Checkout password? Reset your password
Your fingerprint didn\'t match. Please try again.
Welcome back to Visa Checkout\'s fingerprint authentication
Sign in to restart your purchase
To protect your Visa Checkout account, we signed you out. Sign in to start again.
For security purposes, we\'ve locked your Visa Checkout account. Please contact customer support for help.
For security purposes, we\'ve locked this device from using Visa Checkout. Please try again later.
Sorry, the password you\'ve entered doesn\'t match what we have on file. If you\'ve forgotten your password, you can reset it using the \"Forgot Password\" button.
For security purposes, we\'ve temporarily locked your Visa Checkout account. You can try again later or reset your password.
Sorry, you\'ve exceeded the max allowed attempts with your reset code. To continue, please request a new code and try again
Your verification code has expired. Please request a new code and try again.
the email address associated with your Visa Checkout account.
Sorry, the code you entered doesn\'t match what we sent. Please try again
Or you may sign in using another Visa Checkout account
Sorry, we\'re unable to confirm your code at this time. For your protection, we\'ve temporarily locked your account
If you still have not received it, check your email address. The one you entered may not be associated with this Visa Checkout account. Try signing in again, or continue as a new customer
Simply create a new password, then continue to review your purchase
If you don\'t see the email yet, here are a few tips:
We\'ll send another verification code to %1$s
A code was sent to %1$s. If you haven\'t received it yet, give it a few more minutes. Please follow the email instructions
You should receive your code via email shortly.
We\'ll send you a verification code to the email address associated with your Visa Checkout account.
You are on a 3DS??????????????? secure page
Are you sure you want to delete the card ending in %1$s?
Are you sure you want to delete this card?
Successfully deleted the card ending in %1$s
Sorry, your card number cannot be accepted at this time. Please try entering a different card.
Sorry, the card number you entered already exists in your Visa Checkout account. Please try a different card
There seems to be a problem deleting this card. Do you want to retry?
Cannot add an address without all card details are valid
Your card has expired. Please select a different card
Only the above card brands are supported by this Merchant
Sorry, one or more of your entries seems to be invalid at this time. Please try entering a different address.
Sorry, your card number seems to be invalid at this time. Please correct or try entering a different card.
Sorry, one or more of your entries seems to be invalid at this time. Please correct or try entering a different card and address.
Sorry, your payment information is incorrect. Please try again
Sorry, one or more of your entries seems to be invalid at this time. Please correct or try entering a different card.
Sorry, you will not be allowed to add a card at this time. Try using an existing card
E.g., My Points Card, Joint Card
This is your preferred card to pay with
a four-digit code printed on the front side of the card above the number
a three-digit code printed on the back side of the card to the right of the signature strip

Visa Checkout may share information about how you use this card in Visa Checkout with the financial institution that issued the card for customer service, usage analysis, fraud prevention and marketing related to Visa Checkout
This is the address connected to this card on your bank statement.
Please add a credit or debit card to continue with this purchase
Next: You\'ll create your Visa Checkout account
Add a new shipping address, Edit this shipping address or change to another shipping address
Add a new card, Edit this card or change to another card
You will pay with your card nickname of %1$s with last four digits of %2$s.
Welcome back to Visa Checkout %1$s. Review and confirm your purchase information
Not %1$s? Sign out of Visa Checkout or switch to another Visa Checkout account
Review payment and shipping information to complete purchase
Review payment information to complete purchase
Your password has been successfully reset
Your financial institution was unable to authenticate this card
Sorry, your financial institution was unable to authenticate your card. For your security, please use another card.
This merchant does not deliver to %1$s
This merchant does not accept this card
Continue to %1$s to complete your purchase
Continue to add your card to %1$s
This merchant does not accept billing addresses located in %1$s
Additional info is needed before you can use this card
This card is enrolled in MasterCard® SecureCode™. For your protection, your financial institution is requesting that you authenticate the transaction before you can continue.
This card is enrolled in Verified by Visa. For your protection, your financial institution is requesting your Consumer Authentication password before you can continue.
Cancel using Visa Checkout and return to %1$s
Sign in with your Visa Checkout password instead
You\'ve entered an incorrect password. Please try again
For your security, please sign in to your Visa Checkout account to continue.
We have updated our Terms and Conditions.
Please tap on “Agree and Continue“ to agree to Visa Checkout\’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy before continuing
Your email address will be used to send you your order confirmation.
You\'ve entered an invalid character. Please re-enter your first name
You\'ve entered an invalid character. Please re-enter your last name
Already have a Visa Checkout Account?
That\'s okay, you can still checkout. You\'ll be asked to create an account during checkout
Visa Checkout use cookies and similar technologies. By using Visa Checkout, you agree to our use of cookies.
For your protection and to prevent unauthorised access, we\'ve temporarily locked your account. Please contact customer support or try again later.
Android Fingerprint authentication will enable you to login faster to Visa Checkout. Would you like to enable it within this app?
Samsung Pass will enable you to login faster to Visa Checkout. Would you like to enable it within this app?
The email address you entered is invalid. Please try again
To get started, enter your email address.
The merchant may need to use your email address to contact you regarding your order.
Say hello to a speedy, \n\t\t\tsecure checkout
The wallet you have selected is not available
Sorry, looks like something went wrong with %1$s. To continue, please sign in to your Visa Checkout account.
